task_description:
Your task is to find a(n) living thing. First, focus on the thing. Then, move it to the yellow box in the workshop.
This outside location is called the outside. Here you see:   the agent  a substance called air  an axe  a frog egg  a fire pit (containing nothing)  a fountain (containing nothing)  a giant tortoise egg  the ground  a butterfly egg  a substance called wood You also see:  A door to the foundry (that is closed)  A door to the greenhouse (that is closed)  A door to the kitchen (that is closed)
